version_description: Bugs and continued improvements to improve the stability and performance of the app.
Bugs and continued improvements to improve the stability and performance of the app.

Looking for a new Nespresso machine? You can now read the reviews left by other customers and submit your own!
 
This release also includes the following points:
- Faster pairing with your Nespresso Prodigio connected machine
- Improvement of the iPad navigation for our product pages
- Several fixes to unexpected crashes
 
To make the Nespresso App run smoother and faster, from this release we will support only iOS8 and above.
Customers with devices running on iOS 7 can continue using the Nespresso App but will no longer receive app updates.
To receive further updates, please upgrade your device to the latest OS.
  
Something in the app not working or you would like a specific new feature not yet implemented? Leave us a comment on the app store or send us your request by using our contact form in the app and our coffee specialists will get in touch with you.
Bugs and continued improvements to improve the stability and performance of the app.
Bugs and continued improvements to improve the stability and performance of the app.

AUTHENTICATE YOURSELF THANKS TO YOUR FINGERPRINT
We finally offer Touch ID, which can help you to easily and rapidly sign in. Gone are the days of forgotten password popups! You can activate TouchID from the My Account section in the app.

EXPERT : OUR NEW CONNECTED MACHINE*
Expert, our second connected machine is now available in our stores. With its stylish and unique design, we hope that this new “silhouette” will charm you! Expert brings lots of new functionalities, tailored to make you the perfect cup, every time. Customize the temperature of your coffee, brew an Americano cup, adapt the amount of brewed coffee vs. hot water, to match your preferences. Save it all to get the same excellent cup the next time with a tap.

BETTER PERFORMANCE
We reviewed and improved what happens under hood in our app, to enable faster and smoother experience.

*Availability depends on your geographical area.

AUTHENTICATE YOURSELF THANKS TO YOUR FINGERPRINT
We finally offer Touch ID, which can help you to easily and rapidly sign in. Gone are the days of forgotten password popups! You can activate TouchID from the My Account section in the app.

EXPERT : OUR NEW CONNECTED MACHINE
Expert, our second connected machine is now available in our stores. With its stylish and unique design, we hope that this new “silhouette” will charm you! Expert brings lots of new functionalities, tailored to make you the perfect cup, every time. Customize the temperature of your coffee, brew an Americano cup, adapt the amount of brewed coffee vs. hot water, to match your preferences. Save it all to get the same excellent cup the next time with a tap.

BETTER PERFORMANCE
We reviewed and improved what happens under hood in our app, to enable faster and smoother experience.

WHAT ELSE ?
For the moment, that’s it! Wait a second… We just released our latest TV spot with our friend George. Make sure to look it up, don’t miss out on his new adventures… :)
Bugs and continued improvements to improve the stability and performance of the app.

NEW DESIGN & FUNCTIONALITIES IN MY MACHINE SECTION
We have completely renewed the design of my Machine section for a better experience.
We have also added a new section “Discovery” allowing you to rediscover all the Grand Crus with the Nespresso recommendations and add the one you prefer the best in your “Favorite”.

Discover right now what is new for your machine!
